title: Font Validator - User Group
content:
Just curious if this MSN User Group is dead. I signed-up to it last week per Jim Gallagher’s recommendation toward Font Validator, and have yet to receive a notification.

It appears this is the only way one can download the program - understandable, coming from MS.

Unless anyone is aware of another validation tool? I use TTX.exe quite a bit, as well as TTFDUMP.exe, but to me these tools are not quite giving me the kind of feedback I’m interested in.

And suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

 [‹ Bible Centaur](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825145354/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6588 "Go to previous forum topic") [There's a new SOTA in town ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825145354/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34518 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Daniel Denk

comments.content:
Not dead, just in England. Will try to get to this today.

Cheers, Si
Thanks for the reply, Sii. Greatly appreciated.

I approved all the outstanding requests. You should be in now.

Cheers, Si
